00006 #define strncasecmp strnicmp

00032  #if SIZEOF_OFF_T == SIZEOF_LONG
00033   #define str_to_off_t(p, e, b) strtol(p, e, b)
00034   #define STR_OFF_T_MAX LONG_MAX
00035   #define STR_OFF_T_MIN LONG_MIN 
00036  #elif defined(HAVE_STRTOLL)
00037   #define str_to_off_t(p, e, b) strtoll(p, e, b)
00038   #define STR_OFF_T_MAX LLONG_MAX
